long_description: The women's Saucony Virrata 2 Road-Running Shoes have a barely-there feel that has made them a favorite of runners seeking a zero drop from heel to toe with plenty of protection from the road. Updated second edition features an incredibly breathable and quick-drying monomesh upper along with an internal bootie that creates a socklike fit and feel. Zero drop from heel to toe encourages a natural midfoot or forefoot strike to promote forward momentum and reduce the impact of heel striking. 18mm of EVA in the forefoot and heel provides superior cushioning. Flexible platform helps activate a great range of motion when you're running. Collar lining material combines superior moisture-wicking properties with a plush feel for comfort. Premium carbon rubber outsole material offers exceptional traction and high-wear properties; triangular lug design provides traction and durability.
